TASK: Add text to image
DOMAIN: paint

STEPS:
1. Open the Start menu to access applications
   REASONING: Need to launch Paint application to work with images
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.02, y=0.98)

2. Wait for Start menu to open
   REASONING: UI needs time to render before interaction
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

3. Type "Paint" to search for the application
   REASONING: Searching is the fastest way to locate Paint in Windows
   ACTION: TYPE("paint")

4. Wait for search results to appear
   REASONING: System needs time to process search query and display results
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

5. Click on Paint application from search results
   REASONING: Launch the Paint application to begin working with images
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.3)

6. Wait for Paint to fully load
   REASONING: Application needs time to initialize and display the canvas
   ACTION: WAIT(2.0)

7. Click on the Text tool in the toolbar
   REASONING: Need to activate the text tool to add text to the canvas
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.15, y=0.08)

8. Click on the canvas where text should be placed
   REASONING: Define the starting position for the text box on the image
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.4, y=0.4)

9. Wait for text box to appear
   REASONING: Paint needs to create and render the text input area
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

10. Type the desired text content
    REASONING: Enter the actual text that will be added to the image
    ACTION: TYPE("Hello World")

11. Click outside the text box to finalize the text
    REASONING: Clicking outside commits the text to the image and deactivates the text tool
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.7, y=0.7)

12. Mark task as complete
    REASONING: Text has been successfully added to the image
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: Paint application is open with text "Hello World" added to the canvas. The text is now part of the image and can be saved or further edited.
